summary: Small mod keeping resurrected corpses from ever turning to ash and thus able to be resurrected again.  Corpses will remain until their standard \'clean-up\' script dictates (usually about 3-10 game days). This applies to all resurrection type spells.  Resurrection and conjuration sounds have also been improved and made more appropriate.
descriptionHtml:
Small mod keeping resurrected corpses from ever turning to ash and thus able to be resurrected again.  Corpses will remain until their standard \'clean-up\' script dictates (usually about 3-10 game days). This applies to all resurrection type spells.  Resurrection and conjuration sounds have also been improved and made more appropriate.

Not much more to say on this one, tiny mod but makes playing conjuration characters much more interesting and immersive.

~\"Another corpse for the pile...\"~
author: Wasbunny
